input.sentences: these three people gather and show off their costumes .
the lady with the pink hair introduces herself to the dog | who is also dressed for the occasion .
this beautiful lady is an angel and the person who she is next to is a duck .
this devil lady holds the dog in her arms | refusing to let him go . the dog is sad .
